sentences.en: Anyone who looks upon an outcast breaks the law of the flock!
sentences.cn: 凡是崇尚流放者便触犯了鸥群的法律!

sentences.en: Arriving in his dad's car won't turn him into an outcast!
sentences.cn: 坐我的车送他过去不用担心会出什么事!

sentences.en: He had always been an outcast, unwanted and alone.
sentences.cn: 他一直都被视为异类，无人理睬，形单影只。

sentences.en: He looks for scalps like an outcast.
sentences.cn: 他象恶棍一样到处想剥头皮.

sentences.en: He was treated like an outcast by the other children.
sentences.cn: 他受到其他小朋友的排斥.

sentences.en: His condemnation made him an outcast.
sentences.cn: 他之被判罪使他见绝于人.

sentences.en: I am outcast, discarded because I might cause embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 我是流浪者, 被驱逐的,因为我可能会给你们惹来麻烦.

sentences.en: Pearl was a born outcast of the infantile world.
sentences.cn: 珠儿生来便是那婴孩天地的弃儿.

sentences.en: Puyi , who is just like an outcast, read out the abdicate rescript.
sentences.cn: 如同丧家之犬的溥仪也随之神情沮丧地宣读了退位主诏书.

sentences.en: Smokers often feel as though they are being treated as social outcasts.
sentences.cn: 吸烟者常常觉得自己遭到社会排斥。

sentences.en: The star student of the second grade is a moral outcast.
sentences.cn: 二年级的尖子是个地地道道的流氓.

sentences.en: There was an outcast's son, Sopaka, who became known as Matanga.
sentences.cn: 举世闻名的摩登是旃陀罗的儿子, 是贱民.

sentences.en: Timon: Ah, you are an outcast. That's great. So are we.
sentences.cn: 丁满: 啊, 你是个被驱逐者. 太棒了. 我们也是.

sentences.en: Timon: Ahh. You an outcast. That's great, are we.
sentences.cn: 泰蒙: 噢, 你是个流浪者. 这太好了, 我们也是.

sentences.en: When you are outcast, even a tossed stone can be cherished.
sentences.cn: 当你是个被抛弃的人, 别人丢块石头你也会当宝贝.

sentences.en: Win and you are king; lose and you are the outcast.

trans.tran_cn: 被遗弃的；被遗弃者，被逐出者
trans.tran_en: someone who is not accepted by the people they live among, or who has been forced out of their home

trans.tran_cn: 被逐的, 被排斥的, 被遗弃的
被抛弃者，流浪的人，被驱逐的人，流氓，无赖
trans.tran_en: someone who is not accepted by the people they live among, or who has been forced out of their home
